abstracts.cdata!:
This guidance aims to provide staff of
            Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam (BIDV); and
            participating financial intermediaries (PFIs) involved in
            management and implementation of the project, as follows :
            environmental screening mechanisms for implementation of
            subprojects financed under the project; measures to avoid or
            minimize adverse environmental impacts that might happen
            during implementation of sub-projects; throughout the
            sub-loan's duration, the subproject owner shall be
            subject to BIDV and PFI's monitoring and supervision
            with respect to implementation of regulations that have been
            approved by the environmental management agencies; PFIs
            shall cooperate with local environmental management agencies
            (DONREs) to monitor and supervise subproject owners with
            respect to compliance and implementation of environment
            protection commitments and regulations set out in the EIA
            report; during the project implementation, PFIs shall be
            subject to regular / irregular monitoring and supervision by
            BIDV and the WB's environmental specialist with respect
            to the implementation of regulations of this guidance; this
            guidance document includes a list of pesticides and
            herbicides forbidden in Vietnam; finally, compliance with
            Bank's general policy on environment protection,
            Vietnam's laws and decrees on environmental protection,
            circulars, and the charter on organization and operations of
            the Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam (BIDV).
